title: shrngAravAgide
sahitya:
shrngAravAgide siri rangana manca angane mahalakumyarasa malaguva manca


caraNam 1    baDiga muTTida manca maDuvinoLiha manca mrDana tOLali nelasiha manca 
heDeyuLLa hosa manca poDavi hottiha manca kaDal;a shayana shrIrangana manca
    caraNam 2    kaNNu kiviyAda manca bennu bAgida manca huNNimeya candramana aDDa gaTTuva manca 
baNNa biLupina manca honnu kAdiha manca cenniga parIkSitana prANava koNDa manca
    caraNam 3    kAliila tODuva manca kALi nunguva manca nAlage eraDuLLa viSada manca  
Ezhu hedeya manca mUlOkadoDeyana manca kALagadali kirITiya mukuTa koNDa manca
    caraNam 4    hakkige hageyAda manca rokka muTTda manca rakkasarade dallaNana manca  
sokku pIDida manca bakkane pOguva manca lakkumi ramaNa shrI hariya manca
    caraNam 5    anku Donkina manca akalanka mahima manca san-karuSANanemba sugada manca 
shankarana koraLige padakavAgiha manca venkaTa purandara viTTalarAyana manca
